body:
There is not. APIs are in their nature http and independent from the client side.

Be that as it may, a good way to do this, is to generate the open api json file, and auto generate the client side https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/aspnet/core/tutorials/web-api-help-pages-using-swagger?view=aspnetcore-3.1. Check https://github.com/OpenAPITools/openapi-generator for a library to do that.

This is similar to wsdl for soap services.
